name: Idle Law Firm: Justice Empire
description:
Will you be able to successfully run your Law Firm business and become the best at it?

Run the office and manage your lawyers. Provide legal advice for the clients and earn money to become a business tycoon. Lawyers visit the courthouse daily, so make sure to keep them satisfied and motivated to win most cases.

Idle Law Firm main features:
Open different law firms;
Open new rooms to accommodate more workers;
Hire and assign lawyers for specific tasks;
Upgrade all interior elements in order to make your workers more productive;
Hire janitors and electrician to keep everything working smoothly;
Use bonuses to earn more money;
Complete specific tasks to unlock new achievements;
Real-life 3d simulation;

Play now our new and addictive Law clicker game and have fun. Contact us if you have any questions or suggestions, and we will make sure to get back to you as soon as possible!
